CookieConsentText: By continuing to browse this site, you accept our use of cookies, online selling terms and conditions, and privacy policy.

Description.Title: Printing Art
Description.Content_4: of experience in offering graphic and printing services. We have qualified professionals and use high-end equipment and materials, that allows us to provide the best quality and commitment to the service.
Description.Content_5: We prioritize giving thoroughly crafted work to our customers, in order to provide a complete,
Description.Content_9:
As a company, one of our concerns is the environmental impact of our products. Because of that, we use FSC certified (Forest Stewardship Council), PVC free, recycled and vegan materials in the printing of small formats.
Regarding big format printing, we use water-based colors, certified by WELL'S Green Guard Gold. These colors are odorless, which allows for safe indoor use.
We have been replacing our materials with greener and more sustainable options, such as canvas made of biodegradable polypropylene, 100% recyclable green paper and ecologic, PVC free vinyl.
Our wallpaper is not only washable, but it is also made using fabrics that are PVC free, fiberglass free and without toxic components, so it can be used indoors without causing health issues.
Description.Content_10: We like to believe that our prices are attractive, considering the industry standards, and we have various
Description.Content_12: , including discounts for students. Our goal is to expand our digital presence and offer a better variety of digital services.
Description.Content_13: If you have any inquiry about our services and methods, contact us!

OrderCompleted.ThankYou: Obrigado pela preferência, a sua encomenda irá ser processada.
OrderCompleted.Info: Foi enviado um e-mail (remetente: FormSubmit, submissions@formsubmit.co) com todas as informações relativas à compra.
OrderCompleted.Info2: O pagamento deverá ser efetuado num prazo de 48h via transferência bancária com os dados:
OrderCompleted.Info3: Na ausência deste e-mail, verifique por favor a pasta spam/lixo ou contacte seractivcopy@hotmail.com

BigFormat.Info:
All the printing used has a minimum durability age of 5 years.
In large format printing we use water-based inks that are certified by WELL Green Guard Gold, which means the ink does not possess any lingering odors, allowing for safe indoor uses.
